user_question: Can you give me a recipe for a traditional Ethiopian dish and generate an image of it?
final_answer: Recipe for Doro Wat: 1 whole chicken, 2 onions, 3 tbsp berbere spice, 2 tbsp niter kibbeh, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 4 boiled eggs. Image of Doro Wat generated. Berbere spice is a blend of spices including chili peppers, garlic, ginger, basil, and fenugreek. Homemade recipe: 1 tbsp paprika, 1 tsp cayenne, 1 tsp ginger, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp fenugreek, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp allspice.
